name: River Clean Up
description:
This is a tower defense game where you must protect the ocean form the trash that is coming out of the sewers. Place your cleaning unit to clean the rover before the trash reaches the ocean! But don't forget to manage your units.

Also available to play on Opera GX:https://gxc.gg/games/c45f55b3-a4a1-4f2e-9912-49de7b77a126
